There are several companies in the Cotswolds that offer hot air balloon rides. Here are a few options:

1. Cotswold Balloon Safaris: offers hot air balloon rides over the Cotswolds, with flights departing from various locations in the region.

2. Adventure Balloons: offers hot air balloon rides over the Cotswolds and other areas of the UK, with flights departing from Cheltenham.

3. Aerosaurus Balloons: offers hot air balloon rides over the Cotswolds, with flights departing from Bristol and Bath.

4. Bailey Balloons: offers hot air balloon rides over the Cotswolds and other areas of the UK, with flights departing from various locations.

Remember to book in advance as hot air balloon rides are very popular and often sell out quickly, especially during peak season.
